item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 8, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:

25. Fifty Years of Open Source Software Supply Chain Security (157 points | 62 comments)
26. A Supermarket Bag and a Truckload of FOMO (92 points | 47 comments)
